QuestData.Title: Arakkoa War Path
QuestData.Description: The arakkoa have attacked us again, this time striking in the night and then using their dark magic to escape before we could charge out to meet them in numbers. They use their summoning circles to rescue their warriors from certain death, but they cannot run from us if we attack their homes. Veil Reskk and Veil Shienor lie to the north and northeast.$B$BFind these arakkoa nests and kill as many as you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Advisor Faila asks that you kill 14 Shienor Talonites and 6 Shienor Sorcerers and then return to her in Stonebreaker Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: How many arakkoa have slain $N? Did they run from you? Did they run and hide when you stormed into their camp?
QuestData.RewardText: Well done $C. The arakkoa have learned to fear the might of the Horde.
